title: Flatline
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:jakstyle]]

[[<]]
[[module rate]]
[[/<]]

A few last weak breaths as I fade away,
The light grows then dims again and again,
Thinking becomes hard with a failing brain,
Hopefully this time, dead I will stay.
•
A sudden strain,
Fake pass away,
Deadly foul play,
As I remain.
•
Death had feigned, Reapers foreplay,
A toy hammer hit mortal chain,
A tease of an end to this pain,
One more dip to that gateway.
•
A quick drain,
Sudden gray,
Now halfway,
Coup de main
•
A short delay,
One last refrain,
Life will abstain,
I hope today.
•
Light slain,
I pray,
Decline,
Flatline
•
•
•
•
•
•
•
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5576 |Once more...]]]

author: MrIverson
